name: XAEON WARS
description:
Welcome to XAEON WARS!! 

Get ready  to battle into  a cyberpunk & Sci-fi themed  levels with multiple guns and characters, select your cyber mercenary, customize their weapons, grenades, perks and take advantage using the exclusive ability of each player to eliminate the enemy team.

Pre Alpha v1.0.0 (Development-Test Distribution)

Single Player:

Practice Mode with bots

Select your favorite game mode (3 modes Available in Pre Alpha)

         -Team Deathmatch

         -Free For All

         -Hack The Box

 

Multiplayer:

Create Server (Host Session, Steam/LAN) 

Join Game (Search Available Servers, Steam/LAN)

Select your favorite game mode (3 modes Available in Pre Alpha)

         -Team Deathmatch                       Players 1-10

         -Free For All                                     Players 1-10

         -Hack The Box                                Players 1-10

Note: Online Multiplayer mode requires internet connection and Steam services installed in the computer.

Version Log:

  •      4 Mercenary classes 
  •      3 Perk classes
  •      3 Greande classes
  •      5 Primary Weapons 
  •      2 Secondary Weapons
  •      Public Chat 
  •      Team Chat 
  •      XP and Level system
  •      AutoSaving
  •      Xbox Controller Partially Supported

Current status: Migrating the project to Unreal Engine 5...

Thanks for your support!!
